about.summary: fastText - Library for efficient text classification and representation learning

build.script:
cmake -GNinja \
      -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$PREFIX \
      -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON \
      $SRC_DIR
ninja install
python -m pip install --no-deps --no-build-isolation -vv .

name: fasttext-for-deepsearch-glm

about.summary: fastText - Library for efficient text classification and representation learning

build.script:
cmake -GNinja \
      -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$PREFIX \
      -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON \
      $SRC_DIR
ninja install
python -m pip install --no-deps --no-build-isolation -vv .

about.summary: fastText - Library for efficient text classification and representation learning

build.script:
cmake -GNinja \
      -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$PREFIX \
      -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON \
      $SRC_DIR
ninja install
python -m pip install --no-deps --no-build-isolation -vv .

raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: fasttext-for-deepsearch-glm
  version: 0.1.0

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/PeterStaar-IBM/fastText/archive/refs/tags/v${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f5772a90dc30893dfcd99efbd4fb0dc46f5d7a8388e9da5cc41a8bd8b4d94e1e
  patches:
    - setup.patch

build:
  number: 5
  skip: win
  script: |
    cmake -GNinja \
          -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$PREFIX \
          -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON \
          $SRC_DIR
    ninja install
    python -m pip install --no-deps --no-build-isolation -vv .

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - numpy
        - pybind11
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - cmake <4
    - ninja
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools >=0.7.0
    - numpy
    - pybind11 >=2.2
  run:
    - python
    - numpy
    - pybind11 >=2.2
  run_exports:
    - ${{ pin_subpackage(name, upper_bound='x.x.x') }}
  run_constraints:
    - fasttext <0 # see https://github.com/conda-forge/fasttext-feedstock/pull/23 for context

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - fasttext
      pip_check: true
  - script:
      - fasttext supervised -h || [[ $? == 1 ]]
  - package_contents:
      include:
        - fasttext/args.h
        - fasttext/autotune.h
        - fasttext/densematrix.h
        - fasttext/dictionary.h
        - fasttext/fasttext.h
        - fasttext/loss.h
        - fasttext/matrix.h
        - fasttext/meter.h
        - fasttext/model.h
        - fasttext/productquantizer.h
        - fasttext/quantmatrix.h
        - fasttext/real.h
        - fasttext/utils.h
        - fasttext/vector.h
      bin:
        - fasttext
      lib:
        - fasttext
      site_packages:
        - fasttext
        - fasttext.util
      files:
        - "*/pkgconfig/fasttext.pc"

about:
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: fastText - Library for efficient text classification and representation learning
  homepage: https://fasttext.cc/
  repository: https://github.com/facebookresearch/fastText
  documentation: https://fasttext.cc/docs/en/support.html

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hadim
